item.description: This is still the same - unorganized - monthly meetup. There is a possiblity that I might actually make it there myself, and I would love to meet some members of the group. Would that entice anybody to join in and maybe spend some time over a good game (and a good beer) afterward?

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons September Meetup
